entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a team member who has become quieter and quieter on the way to the pitch. He is addressed by his teammates with nicknames such as 'Ickle Prefect'.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as a team member who winks at Ron and addresses him with a nickname.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as a team member who teases Ron with a nickname 'Ickle Prefect' and emerges from the neck of his Quidditch robes.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is mentioned as the captain who enters the changing room already changed and gives instructions to her teammates.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a team member who thinks that something in Angelina's voice made him suspicious.

entities.name: oliver wood
entities.description: Oliver Wood is mentioned as the previous owner of Ron's Quidditch robes.

relationships.description: George addresses Ron with a nickname 'Ickle Prefect'.
Fred teases Ron with a nickname 'Ickle Prefect'.
Harry thinks that something in Angelina's voice made him suspicious.
